Posts.Content: Thank you, sea60 for your very realistic, yet very hopeful post! I'm currently in 2nd cycle of chemo, then I'll have radiation. Prayer from many friedns and family and trust in God is what is getting me through this with much peace. I hope you are doing well.
Posts.Title: Stage 3b now, fear of future metastasis

Posts.Content: Thank you for your openness, Camul. Sounds like you have been through alot, bless your heart! Hang in there- God is in control and as you have realized, I sure and will help you live one day at a time!
Posts.Title: Stage 3b now, fear of future metastasis

Posts.Content: Great post and I love your user name, beepositive- too cute!! Yes, our length of days is in God's Hands, it's not over till He says it's time.
